sentences.en: A jeep is heading straight for us.
sentences.cn: 一辆吉普车从对面开过来.

sentences.en: He put the jeep in four-wheel drive and splashed up the slope.
sentences.cn: 他将吉普车切换为四轮驱动模式后涉水爬上了坡。

sentences.en: He told the driver to stop the jeep.
He tooled the jeep skillfully along the jungle path.
sentences.cn: 他沿着林中小路熟练地驾驶吉普车行进.

sentences.en: Inside the jeep the atmosphere was glacial.
sentences.cn: 吉普车里的气氛相当冷淡。

sentences.en: Is it a jeep or a car?
sentences.cn: 这是一辆吉普车还是辆轿车?

sentences.en: The jeep has been blocked in by all those lorries.
sentences.cn: 吉普车已被那些卡车团团围住了.

sentences.en: The jeep was found lying in thick bush.
sentences.cn: 人们发现吉普车翻倒在一处茂密的丛林里。

sentences.en: The officials had issued strict instructions that we were not to get out of the jeep.
sentences.cn: 有关官员严令禁止我们下吉普车。

sentences.en: The two men leaped into the jeep and roared off.
sentences.cn: 两名男子跳上吉普车，疾驰而去。

sentences.en: There are some homely products like a Jeep station wagon.
sentences.cn: 有一些很平常的产品,象客货两用吉普车.

sentences.en: They thrust him into the back of a jeep.
sentences.cn: 他们把他硬塞进吉普车后座。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, I was still very clumsy behind the wheel of the jeep.
sentences.cn: 令人遗憾的是我开起吉普来还是笨手笨脚。

trans.tran_en: a type of car made for travelling over rough ground
